attributes.title: 2022 Toyota Urban Cruiser 1.5 Xs Auto

attributes.description:
This Land Cruiser LC300 3.5T ZX in Glacier white exterior, 20" Toyota alloy mag wheels, LED Adaptive high-beam system, Exterior chrome package, Toyota’s electronic kinetic dynamic suspension system, AWD integrated management, Multi-Terrain Monitor which displays obstacles at the front of the car so the driver can see them more easily, Multi-terrain select that automatically selects best driving mode basd on road conditions, Rear Torsen LSD differential lock, Reverse Camera, Park distance control, Intelligent clearance sonar, Rear cross traffic alert, Downhill assist control, Lane keeping system, Crawl control, Electronic brake force distribution, Trailer sway control, Drive mode select incl: Eco – Normal – Sport - Sport S+ - Comfort – Custom, Side mirrors features in chrome – Electrochromatic – Illuminated - Blind spot monitor – heated – Camera – Reverse linked tilt and is power retractable, Full leather interior in Black, 4 Spoke leather and wood trim Toyota multifunction steering wheel with heating options, Hydraulic power steering, Heads up display, 12.3” Display audio touchscreen infotainment system maximises the Land Cruiser 300’s off-road proficiency with its 3D multi-terrain monitor, Panoramic view monitor views of the trail in front - underfloor and rear are displayed on the high-resolution infotainment screen, Apple CarPlay and Android Auto connectivity, Cruise control select on all speeds, Electrochromatic rear view mirror
 
 Service plan 9 year or 90 000km
